statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (4,-8) and (7,1).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{1}-{\left(-{8}\right)}}}{{{7}-{\left({4}\right)}}}=\frac{{9}}{{3}} which reduces to \displaystyle{3} (if it's not already reduced)
